§ world-wide-web

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

The **world wide web** is a very popular decentralized [[computer-network]] that runs on top of [[the-internet]].

Nowadays, the name //world wide web// is either shortened to [[www]] or shortened to [[the-web]].
